rescuecore2.worldmodel

Class DefaultWorldModel<T extends Entity>

  • java.lang.Object
    • rescuecore2.worldmodel.AbstractWorldModel<T>
      • rescuecore2.worldmodel.DefaultWorldModel<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The subclass of Entity that this world model holds.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<T>, WorldModel<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    StandardWorldModel

    public class DefaultWorldModel<T extends Entity>
extends AbstractWorldModel<T>
    Default implementation of a WorldModel.

      • DefaultWorldModel

        public DefaultWorldModel(java.lang.Class<? extends T> clazz)
        Construct an empty world model.
        Parameters:
        clazz - The class of objects that are allowed in this world model. This approach is a workaround for the limitations of Java generics.
